column4: sudo apt-get install libfreetype6-dev:i386 removes random packages build-essential dkms g++ gcc gcc-multilib libcairo2-dev libfontconfig1-dev libfreetype6-dev libgtk2.0-dev libimlib2-dev libpango1.0-dev libxft-dev nvidia-current tk-dev  tk8.5-dev virtualbox-dkms, can't compile wine due to it
